categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope actors

nodes.text: Andy Bradford (born September 7, 1944) is an English stunt coordinator who performed stunts for Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope and portrayed Tanbris.
Bradford's stunt credits include 1987's The Princess Bride (with Bob Anderson), 1986's Highlander (with Hugh Quarshie) and 1992's Patriot Games (with Harrison Ford).
